functional_units.name: Permanently Blocked Tasks Archive
functional_units.description: Central repository for tasks that cannot proceed due to missing resources; provides documentation and conditions required to resume.

functional_units.name: CI Pipeline Configuration
functional_units.description: Automated GitHub Actions workflow that builds and tests ISOInspector Swift package on every pull request, with status checks and caching.

functional_units.name: ParsePipeline Streaming Interface Evaluation
functional_units.description: Documentation of asynchronous ParsePipeline event model, parser integration guidance, and fixture planning for streaming validation.

functional_units.name: ParsePipeline Live Streaming Implementation
functional_units.description: Implementation of ParsePipeline.live() for nested box traversal, offset accounting, and regression unit tests.

functional_units.name: ParsePipeline Live Integration with Production Walker
functional_units.description: Wiring of ParsePipeline.live() to the production StreamingBoxWalker, validating nested traversal and cancellation propagation.

functional_units.name: MP4RA Metadata Catalog Integration
functional_units.description: Integration of MP4RA-backed BoxCatalog into streaming pipeline, including bundled metadata fixture and diagnostics coverage.

functional_units.name: MP4RA Catalog Refresh Automation
functional_units.description: CLI automation for regenerating MP4RABoxes.json and maintaining catalog alignment with upstream registry.

functional_units.name: Metadata-Driven Validation & Reporting Extension
functional_units.description: Extension of MP4RA metadata-aware validation layer, integration of EventConsoleFormatter, and reporting updates exposing catalog-backed context.

functional_units.name: VR-003 Metadata Comparison Rule Implementation
functional_units.description: CLI and validation pipeline warning flow for comparing metadata against catalog data with expanded coverage for truncated payloads.

functional_units.name: VR-003 Metadata Validation Tests
functional_units.description: Unit and live parse integration tests ensuring VR-003 comparison behavior remains warning-free.

functional_units.name: Structural Validation Rules VR-001/VR-002
functional_units.description: Validation of impossible box sizes, boundary drift detection, and regression coverage in BoxValidatorTests.

functional_units.name: Ordering Validation Rules VR-004/VR-005
functional_units.description: State tracking for ftyp precedence, streaming-aware exceptions for fragmented layouts, and unit/integration coverage.

functional_units.name: VR-006 Research Logging Delivery
functional_units.description: Persistent research logging shared by CLI and UI consumers with configurable log handling and expanded pipeline coverage.

functional_units.name: Research Log Monitoring & Adoption
functional_units.description: Audit helper and monitoring checklist for VR-006 diagnostics across SwiftUI previews and UI smoke telemetry.

functional_units.name: SwiftUI Preview Integration of ResearchLogMonitor
functional_units.description: Integration of ResearchLogMonitor.audit(logURL:) into SwiftUI previews, deterministic VR-006 fixtures, preview diagnostics views.

functional_units.name: Telemetry Smoke Tests for VR-006
functional_units.description: Automated tests exercising ResearchLogTelemetryProbe and Snapshot across CLI and SwiftUI entry points.

functional_units.name: Combine Bridge & ParseTree Store Integration
functional_units.description: Combine-based bridge fans out ParseEvent streams to @MainActor parse tree store aggregating validation issues for SwiftUI consumers.

functional_units.name: SwiftUI Tree View Virtualization
functional_units.description: Outline explorer powered by ParseTreeStore with severity filtering, search, and preview data seeding for virtualization experiments.

functional_units.name: Streaming Outline Explorer Integration
functional_units.description: Explorer consuming live ParseTreeStore snapshots, latency instrumentation via Logger signposts, and removal of preview-only sample data.

functional_units.name: Outline Filters Extension
functional_units.description: Reusable box classification helpers and streaming metadata toggles extending outline explorer filters while maintaining performance.

functional_units.name: Detail & Hex Inspectors
functional_units.description: SwiftUI detail and hex inspectors bound to ParseTreeSnapshot updates with metadata panes, validation issue listings, and synchronized hex slices.

functional_units.name: Field Subrange Highlighting
functional_units.description: Synchronized SwiftUI detail pane annotations and hex highlighting for selectable field subranges.

functional_units.name: Category Filtering in Outline Explorer
functional_units.description: MP4RA catalog enrichment adding category chips and streaming toggles to outline explorer without regression.

functional_units.name: Automated Fixture Corpus Development
functional_units.description: Roadmap and implementation of automated test fixtures covering fragmented, DASH, large payload, and malformed samples.

functional_units.name: CoreData Annotation Persistence
functional_units.description: CoreData-backed annotation and bookmark store with sync between persistence layer and SwiftUI consumers.

functional_units.name: JSON & Binary Export Modules
functional_units.description: Reusable parse tree builder plus JSON and binary exporters in ISOInspectorKit with CLI smoke coverage.

functional_units.name: CLI Export Commands
functional_units.description: Implementation of export-json and export-capture commands, option parsing, output validation, and integration with ISOInspectorKit exporters.

functional_units.name: DocC Catalog Setup & Publishing CI
functional_units.description: Scaffolding for ISOInspectorKit DocC catalog, automation scripts, and GitHub Actions job for publishing archives.

functional_units.name: Accessibility Features Rollout
functional_units.description: VoiceOver descriptors, keyboard focus management, Dynamic Type validation, and XCTest coverage for UI components.

functional_units.name: NestedA11yIDs Integration
functional_units.description: Integration of NestedA11yIDs across ISOInspector App parse tree explorer and CLI/UI metadata consumption.

functional_units.name: CLI Base Command Scaffold
functional_units.description: Root isoinspector command with placeholder subcommands inspect, validate, export.

functional_units.name: Streaming CLI Commands
functional_units.description: Implementation of streaming inspect and validate commands with asynchronous environment wiring and logging.

functional_units.name: SwiftUI App Shell Build
functional_units.description: Navigation shell with AppShellView, persisted DocumentRecentsStore, and DocumentSessionController integration.

functional_units.name: Performance Benchmark Harnesses
functional_units.description: Benchmarks for CLI validation throughput and Combine‑based UI latency metrics.

functional_units.name: Parser Event Pipeline Integration
functional_units.description: Wiring of streaming parser bridge into application shell, automatic selection of first parsed node.

functional_units.name: Streaming Export Routing
functional_units.description: Routing of isoinspector export JSON/Binary flows through shared streaming capture utilities.

functional_units.name: Combine UI Benchmark macOS
functional_units.description: Benchmark plan for measuring Combine‑based UI performance on macOS.

functional_units.name: UI Automation for Streaming Default Selection
functional_units.description: XCTest UI automation harness that asserts outline/detail synchronization during live updates.

functional_units.name: CLI Global Logging & Telemetry Toggles
functional_units.description: Global logging and telemetry toggles for CLI, including dependency-injectable view wiring.

functional_units.description: Model for ParseIssue with severity, code, byte range, and node reference; metrics aggregation in CLI/SwiftUI.
